sqlMap.select: select RPB_SNO, RPB_NNUM, UD_SNO, UD_SNO1, RPB_SREPORTUNITNAME, RPB_SPROJECTNAME, RPB_SYEAR, EMP_SNO, RPB_SPERSON, RPB_SPROTYPE, RPB_SREPORTTOTAL, RPB_SSUGGESTTOTAL, RPB_SLEVEL, RPB_SMEM, RPB_SISDEL, RPB_SISVALID, RPB_SREPLYBY, RPB_SREPLYDATE, RPB_SALTERBY, RPB_SALTERDATE, RPB_SDEF1, RPB_SDEF2, RPB_SDEF3, RPB_SDEF4, RPB_SDEF5, RPB_SDEF6, RPB_SDEF7, RPB_SDEF8, RPB_SDEF9, RPB_SDEF10, RPB_SDEF11, RPB_SDEF12, RPB_SDEF13, RPB_SDEF14, RPB_SDEF15, RPB_DDEF16, RPB_DDEF17, RPB_DDEF18, RPB_DDEF19, RPB_DDEF20, RPB_NDEF1, RPB_NDEF2, RPB_NDEF3, RPB_NDEF4, RPB_NDEF5, RPB_NDEF6, RPB_NDEF7, RPB_NDEF8, RPB_NDEF9, RPB_NDEF10, RPB_NDEF11 from CG.RP_REPORTBEGIN where RPB_SNO = #RPB_SNO:VARCHAR#

$pageSQLA$ SELECT RPB_SNO, RPB_NNUM, UD_SNO, UD_SNO1, RPB_SREPORTUNITNAME, RPB_SPROJECTNAME, RPB_SYEAR, EMP_SNO, RPB_SPERSON, RPB_SPROTYPE, RPB_SREPORTTOTAL, RPB_SSUGGESTTOTAL, RPB_SLEVEL, RPB_SMEM, RPB_SISDEL, RPB_SISVALID, RPB_SREPLYBY, RPB_SREPLYDATE, RPB_SALTERBY, RPB_SALTERDATE, RPB_SDEF1, RPB_SDEF2, RPB_SDEF3, RPB_SDEF4, RPB_SDEF5, RPB_SDEF6, RPB_SDEF7, RPB_SDEF8, RPB_SDEF9, RPB_SDEF10, RPB_SDEF11, RPB_SDEF12, RPB_SDEF13, RPB_SDEF14, RPB_SDEF15, RPB_DDEF16, RPB_DDEF17, RPB_DDEF18, RPB_DDEF19, RPB_DDEF20, RPB_NDEF1, RPB_NDEF2, RPB_NDEF3, RPB_NDEF4, RPB_NDEF5, RPB_NDEF6, RPB_NDEF7, RPB_NDEF8, RPB_NDEF9, RPB_NDEF10, RPB_NDEF11 from CG.RP_REPORTBEGIN T where 1 = 1
T.RPB_SYEAR LIKE '%'||#searchA#||'%'
T.UD_SNO LIKE '%'||#searchB1#||'%'
T.UD_SNO1 LIKE '%'||#searchB2#||'%'
T.RPB_SPROJECTNAME LIKE '%'||#searchC#||'%'
T.EMP_SNO LIKE '%'||#searchD#||'%'
t.RPB_SREPLYDATE >= to_date('$searchE$ 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
t.RPB_SREPLYDATE <= to_date('$searchF$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY RPB_SREPLYDATE DESC $pageSQLB$

SELECT * from CG.RP_REPORTBEGIN T where 1 = 1
T.RPB_SYEAR LIKE '%'||#searchA#||'%'
T.UD_SNO LIKE '%'||#searchB1#||'%'
T.UD_SNO1 LIKE '%'||#searchB2#||'%'
T.RPB_SPROJECTNAME LIKE '%'||#searchC#||'%'
T.EMP_SNO LIKE '%'||#searchD#||'%'
t.RPB_SREPLYDATE >= to_date('$searchE$ 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
t.RPB_SREPLYDATE <= to_date('$searchF$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
sqlMap.insert: insert into CG.RP_REPORTBEGIN (RPB_SNO, RPB_NNUM, UD_SNO, UD_SNO1, RPB_SREPORTUNITNAME, RPB_SPROJECTNAME, RPB_SYEAR, EMP_SNO, RPB_SPERSON, RPB_SPROTYPE, RPB_SREPORTTOTAL, RPB_SSUGGESTTOTAL, RPB_SLEVEL, RPB_SMEM, RPB_SISDEL, RPB_SISVALID, RPB_SREPLYBY, RPB_SREPLYDATE, RPB_SALTERBY, RPB_SALTERDATE, RPB_SDEF1, RPB_SDEF2, RPB_SDEF3, RPB_SDEF4, RPB_SDEF5, RPB_SDEF6, RPB_SDEF7, RPB_SDEF8, RPB_SDEF9, RPB_SDEF10, RPB_SDEF11, RPB_SDEF12, RPB_SDEF13, RPB_SDEF14, RPB_SDEF15, RPB_DDEF16, RPB_DDEF17, RPB_DDEF18, RPB_DDEF19, RPB_DDEF20, RPB_NDEF1, RPB_NDEF2, RPB_NDEF3, RPB_NDEF4, RPB_NDEF5, RPB_NDEF6, RPB_NDEF7, RPB_NDEF8, RPB_NDEF9, RPB_NDEF10, RPB_NDEF11) values (#RPB_SNO:VARCHAR#, #RPB_NNUM:DECIMAL#, #UD_SNO:VARCHAR#, #UD_SNO1:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SREPORTUNITNAME:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SPROJECTNAME:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SYEAR:VARCHAR#, #EMP_SNO:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SPERSON:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SPROTYPE:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SREPORTTOTAL:DECIMAL#, #RPB_SSUGGESTTOTAL:DECIMAL#, #RPB_SLEVEL:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SMEM:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SISDEL:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SISVALID:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SREPLYBY:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SREPLYDATE:DATE#, #RPB_SALTERBY:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SALTERDATE:DATE#, #RPB_SDEF1:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF2:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF3:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF4:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF5:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF6:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF7:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF8:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF9:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF10:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF11:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF12:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF13:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF14:VARCHAR#, #RPB_SDEF15:DECIMAL#, #RPB_DDEF16:DATE#, #RPB_DDEF17:DATE#, #RPB_DDEF18:DATE#, #RPB_DDEF19:DATE#, #RPB_DDEF20:DATE#, #RPB_NDEF1:DECIMAL#, #RPB_NDEF2:DECIMAL#, #RPB_NDEF3:DECIMAL#, #RPB_NDEF4:DECIMAL#, #RPB_NDEF5:DECIMAL#, #RPB_NDEF6:DECIMAL#, #RPB_NDEF7:DECIMAL#, #RPB_NDEF8:DECIMAL#, #RPB_NDEF9:DECIMAL#, #RPB_NDEF10:DECIMAL#, #RPB_NDEF11:DECIMAL#)

update CG.RP_REPORTBEGIN
RPB_NNUM = #RPB_NNUM:DECIMAL#
UD_SNO = #UD_SNO:VARCHAR#

update CG.RP_REPORTBEGIN set RPB_NNUM = #RPB_NNUM:DECIMAL#, UD_SNO = #UD_SNO:VARCHAR#, UD_SNO1 = #UD_SNO1:VARCHAR#, RPB_SREPORTUNITNAME = #RPB_SREPORTUNITNAME:VARCHAR#, RPB_SPROJECTNAME = #RPB_SPROJECTNAME:VARCHAR#, RPB_SYEAR = #RPB_SYEAR:VARCHAR#, EMP_SNO = #EMP_SNO:VARCHAR#, RPB_SPERSON = #RPB_SPERSON:VARCHAR#, RPB_SPROTYPE = #RPB_SPROTYPE:VARCHAR#, RPB_SREPORTTOTAL = #RPB_SREPORTTOTAL:DECIMAL#, RPB_SSUGGESTTOTAL = #RPB_SSUGGESTTOTAL:DECIMAL#, RPB_SLEVEL = #RPB_SLEVEL:VARCHAR#, RPB_SMEM = #RPB_SMEM:VARCHAR#, RPB_SISDEL = #RPB_SISDEL:VARCHAR#, RPB_SISVALID = #RPB_SISVALID:VARCHAR#, RPB_SREPLYBY = #RPB_SREPLYBY:VARCHAR#, RPB_SREPLYDATE = #RPB_SREPLYDATE:DATE#, RPB_SALTERBY = #RPB_SALTERBY:VARCHAR#, RPB_SALTERDATE = #RPB_SALTERDATE:DATE#, RPB_SDEF1 = #RPB_SDEF1:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF2 = #RPB_SDEF2:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF3 = #RPB_SDEF3:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF4 = #RPB_SDEF4:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF5 = #RPB_SDEF5:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF6 = #RPB_SDEF6:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF7 = #RPB_SDEF7:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF8 = #RPB_SDEF8:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF9 = #RPB_SDEF9:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF10 = #RPB_SDEF10:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF11 = #RPB_SDEF11:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF12 = #RPB_SDEF12:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF13 = #RPB_SDEF13:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF14 = #RPB_SDEF14:VARCHAR#, RPB_SDEF15 = #RPB_SDEF15:DECIMAL#, RPB_DDEF16 = #RPB_DDEF16:DATE#, RPB_DDEF17 = #RPB_DDEF17:DATE#, RPB_DDEF18 = #RPB_DDEF18:DATE#, RPB_DDEF19 = #RPB_DDEF19:DATE#, RPB_DDEF20 = #RPB_DDEF20:DATE#, RPB_NDEF1 = #RPB_NDEF1:DECIMAL#, RPB_NDEF2 = #RPB_NDEF2:DECIMAL#, RPB_NDEF3 = #RPB_NDEF3:DECIMAL#, RPB_NDEF4 = #RPB_NDEF4:DECIMAL#, RPB_NDEF5 = #RPB_NDEF5:DECIMAL#, RPB_NDEF6 = #RPB_NDEF6:DECIMAL#, RPB_NDEF7 = #RPB_NDEF7:DECIMAL#, RPB_NDEF8 = #RPB_NDEF8:DECIMAL#, RPB_NDEF9 = #RPB_NDEF9:DECIMAL#, RPB_NDEF10 = #RPB_NDEF10:DECIMAL#, RPB_NDEF11 = #RPB_NDEF11:DECIMAL# where RPB_SNO = #RPB_SNO:VARCHAR#
